title: Emerald & Diamond Divyam Jhumkaalu - Divine Temple Earrings
materials: ethically sourced Emerald (Paccha) of approximately 2 carats
brilliant cut Diamonds (Vajraalu) of VS clarity. Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: Intricately crafted open-work Jhumka design inspired by ancient temple architecture. Features a floral motif top with a pear shaped Emerald, and a dome adorned with dazzling diamonds. The bottom rim is decorated with small gold beads. Delicate craftsmanship embodying the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry design.
colors: and sparkling White Diamonds. A timeless color palette deeply rooted in Telugu traditions.
occasions: and special occasions. Adds a touch of traditional elegance to any attire.
description: A unique blend of traditional South Indian design and modern gemstone setting techniques. The high purity gold and meticulously selected gemstones ensure lasting value and beauty. These Jhumkaalu not only enhance your beauty but also connect you to the rich cultural heritage of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana. An heirloom piece to be cherished for generations.
